comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Most likely Courtney Augusta Peck, the second wife of Marcellus Augustus Stovall. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcellus_Augustus_Stovall

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The caption is "Miss" not "Mrs." Miss Marie A. Stovall's "Boodles of Mill Farm" won a dog show prize [ query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9802E2DD103FE433A... ]. In November 1913, her "Pollie of Mill Farm" was a winner. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9907E5D61E3BE633A...

comment.author: 34842005@N00
comment._content: The top dog looks like a Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, but the lower one looks more like a Tibetan Spaniel. What do the rest of you think?
